title: Jane Seton: or, the Kings Advocate. A Scottish historical romance
author: Grant, James
snippet: it and the Calton the narrow road plunged down intothe gorge, where the church of the Trinity lay, passing,on the left, the Carmelite Friary of the Holy Cross atGreenside. Standing forward in strong relief from thedark shoulder of the hdl, and against the blue sky, thebroad boundary, the stone cross and crow-stepped gablesof this edifice, were visible from a group of old elmtrees, under which Birrel posted himself.
